Types

Collider = object
  case kind*: ColliderKind
  of ColliderKind.Circle:
    circle*: Circle
  of ColliderKind.Rect:
    rect*: Rect
  of ColliderKind.Polygon:
    polygon*: Polygon
Collider (for mouse resolution for sprites)   Source   Edit 
ColliderKind {.pure.} = enum
  Circle, Rect, Polygon
